# Creating Graphs using ggplot2

We can create graphs in R using different packages. For the purpose of our learning, we shall use **[ggplot2](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/)** from tidyverse. 

From the reference, you can click on the icons of desired graphs under the `Geoms` sub heading to find more about the graph and how to create it.

## Bar graph

We use the `geom_bar` function to create the bar graph.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df_iris |> 
  ggplot(aes(Species)) +
  geom_bar()

df_iris |> 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(y = Species))

```
